item.title: Germany to Push for End of Gas Storage Targets After 2027 Expiry
item.description: German officials are preparing to push for the European Union to discontinue its gas storage targets when they expire in 2027, and instead implement an alternative strategic reserve system that would be managed by individual member states.

item.title: Sandisk’s 1,700% Rally Keeps Going After ‘Unprecedented’ Quarter
item.description: Digital storage company Sandisk Corp.’s strong revenue and earnings outlook is extending a blistering rally in the top performing stock in the S&P 500 Index.

item.title: NJ to NYC Trains Delayed by 45 Minutes Due to Blocked Tunnel
item.description: A brutal week for commuters continued Friday with New Jersey Transit rail service in and out of New York’s Penn Station subject to large delays.

item.title: US Stocks Slide After Trump’s Fed Chair Pick, Hotter PPI Data
item.description: US equities continued their slide Friday morning as traders bet that President Donald Trump’s pick to replace Jerome Powell as chair of the Federal Reserve would bring a hawkish stance to the central bank.

item.title: Trafigura Was Victim of Nickel Fraud on Grand Scale, Judge Says
item.description: 伦敦法官裁定，富商普拉蒂克·古普塔实施的镍金属欺诈案"规模巨大"，特拉菲古拉集团是该案受害者，这为这家贸易公司追回其6亿美元损失中的一部分提供了机会。【原文：Trafigura Group was the victim of a nickel fraud “on a grand scale” perpetrated by tycoon Prateek Gupta, a London judge ruled, giving the trading house a chance to recoup some of the $600 million in losses it suffered.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉重启美元拍卖 效果乏力难提振玻利瓦尔
item.description: 分析师指出，委内瑞拉重启美元销售的规模可能过于有限且难以预测，难以稳定玻利瓦尔汇率，这使得美元黑市持续承压。【原文：Venezuela’s resumption of dollar sales is probably too limited and too unpredictable to stabilize the bolivar, keeping the parallel market for dollars under pressure, analysts say.】

item.title: 法国股市LVMH的困境拖累了奢侈品行业业绩发布前市场表现
item.description: 在去年短暂喘息之后，路威酩轩集团再度成为法国股市的难题。【原文：LVMH has resurfaced as a problem for French stocks after a brief respite last year.】

item.title: Banks Ready $7.9 Billion Debt Sale to Finance Sealed Air Buyout
item.description: Banks are preparing to sell about $7.9 billion in debt as early as February to finance Clayton Dubilier & Rice’s buyout of packaging firm Sealed Air Corp.

item.title: Fed’s Bostic Says Elevated Inflation Should Keep Rates on Hold
item.description: Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta President Raphael Bostic said elevated inflation means the US central bank should wait before it cuts interest rates again.

item.title: Instacart to Help Costco Take Grocery Orders in Europe in International Push
item.description: Costco Wholesale Corp. will use Instacart's technology to power online grocery ordering in Spain and France, extending their partnership beyond North America for the first time as the delivery company looks overseas for growth.

item.title: India Regulator Clears NSE IPO Plan Ending Decade-Long Wait
item.description: National Stock Exchange of India Ltd. has received clearance from the securities market regulator to initiate steps for an initial public offering, the bourse said in a statement.

item.title: US Producer Prices Top Forecasts on Higher Services Costs
item.description: US wholesale prices rose by more than forecast in December, suggesting companies are increasingly passing on tariff costs at the risk of keeping inflationary pressures elevated.

item.title: Oil’s Year of The Glut Begins With an Unexpected Price Surge
item.description: It was supposed to be the year of glutted oil markets and lower prices, but the first weeks of 2026 have instead been dominated by geopolitical spikes and supply disruption, powering futures to $70 a barrel.

item.title: Canada Economy on Track to Shrink 0.5% in Fourth Quarter
item.description: Canada’s gross domestic product likely shrank in the fourth quarter, highlighting choppy performance as the trade-dependent economy adjusts to US tariffs.

item.title: 德国通胀率在2026年首次欧洲央行会议前小幅突破2%
item.description: 在欧洲最大经济体去年年底录得意外强劲增长后，德国通胀率略有加速。【原文：German inflation accelerated slightly after Europe’s largest economy recorded surprisingly strong expansion at the end of last year.】

item.title: 欧拉首席执行官表示其订阅模式将长期存在
item.description: 尽管竞争对手正尝试推出更便宜的硬件和免月费模式，但热门智能戒指制造商Oura Health Oy仍无意放弃其订阅制商业模式。【原文：Oura Health Oy, the popular smart ring maker, has no plans to abandon its subscription-based business model even as rivals experiment with cheaper hardware and no recurring fees.】

item.title: 凯文·沃什的提名对美联储意味着什么？
item.description: 尽管美国通胀率仍高于美联储的目标水平，特朗普总统仍不断施压美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔要求大幅降息，但始终未能如愿。【原文：President Donald Trump has badgered Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell ceaselessly — and unsuccessfully — for aggressive interest rate cuts despite the fact that US inflation is still overshooting the central bank’s target.】

item.title: 高露洁销售额增长超预期，得益于拉美市场复苏
item.description: 高露洁棕榄公司第四季度销售额增长超出预期，这得益于拉丁美洲市场的反弹——此前该公司因该地区消费者出现不良反应而重新调整了牙膏配方。【原文：Colgate-Palmolive Co. posted stronger-than-expected sales growth in the fourth quarter thanks to a rebound in Latin America after it reformulated a new toothpaste flavor following adverse reactions in the region.】

item.title: 英国风电产量创四年新高 抑制电价上涨
item.description: 英国风电场本月预计将创下近四年来的最高发电量，更多风力涡轮机和强风天气正助力该国逐步摆脱对化石燃料的依赖。【原文：UK wind farms are expected to provide the most power in almost four years this month as more turbines and blustery conditions help the country pivot away from fossil fuels.】

item.title: 万科集团警告称去年亏损扩大至历史最高水平
item.description: 中国万科公司报告称，去年其亏损扩大三分之二，创下历史新高，原因是房地产开发业务急剧下滑以及额外拨备。【原文：China Vanke Co. reported its losses widened by two-thirds to a record last year, citing a sharp decline in its property developments and additional provisions.】

item.title: 监狱股价暴跌，移民与海关执法局引发的反弹加剧企业忧虑
item.description: 当唐纳德·特朗普赢得美国大选时，华尔街投资者曾推动两大私营监狱运营商的股价大幅飙升，但如今特朗普第二任期刚满一年，这波行情便已逐渐消退。【原文：Wall Street investors who drove a massive surge in the shares of the two biggest private prison operators when President Donald Trump won the US election are seeing the trade fizzle out barely a year into his second term.】

item.title: 墨西哥经济超预期增长，2025年末实现反弹
item.description: 墨西哥经济在年末反弹，避免了技术性衰退。此前因美国关税拖累和投资低迷，该国经济在第三季度出现下滑。【原文：Mexico’s economy rebounded at year-end to avoid a technical recession after slumping in the third quarter due the drag from US tariffs and low investment.】

item.title: 欧洲摆脱对俄罗斯天然气的依赖后，又陷入对美国的依赖，似曾相识的困局再度上演
item.description: 摆脱对美国液化天然气进口的依赖并非易事【原文：Diversifying away from American LNG imports won’t be easy】

item.title: 欧洲杠杆贷款创纪录周，因企业争相削减成本
item.description: 本周欧洲杠杆贷款发行量创下历史新高，大批私募股权支持的企业借势投资者强劲需求，成功降低了融资成本。【原文：European leveraged loan issuance hit a record this week as a wave of private equity-backed firms tapped ferocious investor demand to cut their borrowing costs.】

item.title: 贝森特因"杀戮线"言论遭质询，事件在中国引发热议
item.description: 这个词已成为一种代称，指代那条看不见的界线——一旦越过它，许多美国人便会跌出中产阶级行列。【原文：The term has become shorthand for the invisible line beyond which many Americans tumble out of the middle class.】

item.title: 特朗普重启贬值交易，美元恐慌情绪再度升温
item.description: 在金融市场中，有人称之为货币贬值交易；有人则将其视为抛售、对冲，甚至"默默退出"美国。【原文：To some in financial markets it’s known as the debasement trade. To others it’s selling, hedging or even “quiet quitting” America.】

item.title: 特斯拉多空双方达成共识：这绝非普通汽车股
item.description: 投资者们关于特斯拉公司究竟应被视为汽车制造商还是科技巨头的长期争论，本周随着该公司公布其生产线的重大重组计划而接近定论。【原文：The long-standing debate among investors whether Tesla Inc. should be valued as a carmaker or a technology superpower came close to a resolution this week as the company laid out plans for a dramatic reshuffling of its factory lines.】

item.title: 特朗普提名重塑形象的凯文·沃什出任美联储主席
item.description: 据特朗普在真相社交平台上发布的一条帖子称，他计划提名凯文·沃什担任下一任美联储主席。【原文：President Donald Trump said he intends to nominate Kevin Warsh to be the next chair of the Federal Reserve, according to a post on his Truth Social platform.】

item.title: 南非改革势头有望推动经济发展
item.description: 南非政府表示，对加速该国经济增长至关重要的结构性改革已取得进展，近半数改革措施按计划推进，其余改革也取得进展。【原文：Structural reforms vital to accelerating South Africa’s economic growth have gathered steam, the government said, with almost half on track and the rest making progress.】
